instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Black screen w/lines after waking from sleep
threads.message:
820-4924 Liquid damaged. Replaced a few corroded caps and resistors, replaced burned LCD connector and LCD cable. Had no video internal or external, replaced U8300.

Everything working fine now except screen is black with backlight on and about 1" of faint vertical lines when waking from sleep. 

Appreciate any help solving this.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Black screen w/lines after waking from sleep
threads.message: Looks like a bad LCD. Make sure it is not just an LCD problem.

threads.title: [SOLVED]820-4924 Black screen w/lines after waking from sleep
threads.message: Thanks Duke. Figured it out. Same thing with another LCD. U8300 was pulled from a scrap board, replacing it again solved the problem.
